itunes:title: Solving Toddler Sleep Issues with Sleep Expert Lisa Sunbury
title: Solving Toddler Sleep Issues with Sleep Expert Lisa Sunbury
itunes:author: JLML Press
itunes:subtitle: Janet is joined by Lisa Sunbury to provide insighâ€¦
itunes:summary:
Janet is joined by Lisa Sunbury to provide insight and answers to a mom who says she is spending hours every night trying to get her 21-month-old to sleep. Her daughter refuses to stay in her bed alone, and this mom is frustrated and sleep deprived.

For more on common infant/toddler parenting issues, please check out Janet's audio series "Sessions", her private recorded consultations with parents discussing their most immediate and pressing concerns. Find out more at: SessionsAudio.com.
